info.brief_description: Most of us know about the children story " Little Red Riding Hood"  - Have fun RPing.
info.description:
We are familiar with the story Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Grandma, and the Woodsman/Lumberjack.
I am sure that we enjoyed it growing up. But could we have her have a different adventure. It can start out normal but it can vary later on. I am making the rating no higher than PG13. Please no sex, bad words, gore, or anything not PG13. (update: No body swap or transgender either. This one is for a broader range of audience. But we still can give her an adventure ( or even let her take a boring walk to her Grandmother.....if that is what the readers want. LOL and YES, she can fight too IF she wishes. LOL )

Please no killing Red Riding Hood. She is the star of the story. It can include Muscles Growth and/or Shrinking. But that is not required at all either.
